title: Kinou Made Namae Mo Yonde Kurenakatta Koushaku-Sama Ga, Kyuu Ni Dekiai Shitekuru No Desu Ga?
alternative_title: 昨日まで名前も呼んでくれなかった公爵様が、急に溺愛してくるのですが？@COMIC ; Kinou made Namae mo Yonde Kurenakatta Koushaku-sama ga, Kyuu ni Dekiai shitekuru no desu ga? ; 昨日为止都没有唤过我的名字的公爵大人突然开始宠爱我？ ; 昨日為止都沒有喚過我的名字的公爵大人突然開始寵愛我？
status: 昨日まで名前も呼んでくれなかった公爵様が、急に溺愛してくるのですが？@COMIC ; Kinou made Namae mo Yonde Kurenakatta Koushaku-sama ga, Kyuu ni Dekiai shitekuru no desu ga? ; 昨日为止都没有唤过我的名字的公爵大人突然开始宠爱我？ ; 昨日為止都沒有喚過我的名字的公爵大人突然開始寵愛我？
description:
Description :
        Mariène is troubled by the transformation of her cold-blooded and merciless husband, Duke Alexia.After a solitary marriage confined to his mansion, he suddenly proposes to her once more and dotes on her as "my goddess"!He presents her with bouquets of flowers covered in jewels every day, and seduces her with the heart-pounding techniques of romance novels.A redemptive love fantasy between a cold-blooded prince who found love by reverting to death and an unfortunate, calm, goddess daughter!
